# Default Activity Feed Factory

```jsx
const DefaultActivityFeedFactory = (props) => {

	const {id, Activity = ActivityFeed, Timeline = TimelineView, _links, children, ...otherProps} = props;

	const defaultSorting = [{column: "eventDate", direction: "DESC"}];

	const _Activity = withListQueryLoader(Activity);
	const _Timeline = withListQueryLoader(Timeline);

	return (
		<DefaultActivityFeedContainer {...otherProps}
		                              id={id}
		                              queryLink={_links.query}
		                              sorting={defaultSorting}
		                              Activity={_Activity}
		                              Timeline={_Timeline}
		                              _links={_links}
		>
			{children}
		</DefaultActivityFeedContainer>
	);
};
```
